author: treyzania
content: What was the rationale for including the entire EL payload in beacon chain blocks when they're also exchanged/backfilled over p2p (as opposed to just the block number+blockhash, or header)?  Is my understanding correct?

author: m.kalinin
content: it is to avoid DA problem in a critical bit of consensus data. Beacon block can't be fully validated without payload, consider the case where beacon block is received but the corresponding payload isn't available or available only to some portion of validators. This creates a failure mode that isn't easy to deal with
